description.raw:
Some black magic to automatically bump a -release repository to a new major version. Some operations and checks are automatically done. The output could show some FIXME warnings that need manual attention.

I tested it on the copy of ign-fuel-tools3:

[https://github.com/ignition-release/ign-fuel-tools4-release](https://github.com/ignition-release/ign-fuel-tools4-release) 

Run with:

‌

```
jrivero@nium ign-fuel-tools4-release $ ~/release-repo-scripts/bump_major_version.bash 3 4
Moving -release info
==============================
 - From: ignition-fuel-tools3
 - To  : ignition-fuel-tools4
=============================

 * Making unversioned file from ubuntu/debian/libignition-fuel-tools3.install
   - Move symlinks
     - move ./bionic/debian/libignition-fuel-tools3.install
     - move ./debian/sid/debian/libignition-fuel-tools3.install
 * Making unversioned file from ubuntu/debian/libignition-fuel-tools3-dev.install
   - Move symlinks
     - move ./bionic/debian/libignition-fuel-tools3-dev.install
     - move ./debian/sid/debian/libignition-fuel-tools3-dev.install

 * Renaming install files

 * Update changelogs
     ./bionic/debian/changelog
     ./debian/stretch/debian/changelog
     ./debian/sid/debian/changelog

 * Changing values in control file
 * Safety checks in control
    ! FIXME: Breaks clause detected in control file ./ubuntu/debian/control
    ! FIXME: Replaces clause detected in control file ./ubuntu/debian/control

 * Changing values in rules file

 * Safety checks in symlinks
    ! FIXME: Found broken link ./debian/stretch/debian/libignition-fuel-tools2.install
    ! FIXME: Found broken link ./debian/stretch/debian/libignition-fuel-tools2-dev.install
```

git status

```
jrivero@nium ign-fuel-tools4-release $ (master) git status
On branch master
Your branch is up to date with 'origin/master'.

Changes to be committed:
  (use "git reset HEAD <file>..." to unstage)

	renamed:    bionic/debian/libignition-fuel-tools3-dev.install -> bionic/debian/libignition-fuel-tools4-dev.install
	renamed:    bionic/debian/libignition-fuel-tools3.install -> bionic/debian/libignition-fuel-tools4.install
	renamed:    debian/sid/debian/libignition-fuel-tools3-dev.install -> debian/sid/debian/libignition-fuel-tools4-dev.install
	renamed:    debian/sid/debian/libignition-fuel-tools3.install -> debian/sid/debian/libignition-fuel-tools4.install
	renamed:    ubuntu/debian/libignition-fuel-tools3-dev.install -> ubuntu/debian/libignition-fuel-tools4-dev.install
	renamed:    ubuntu/debian/libignition-fuel-tools3.install -> ubuntu/debian/libignition-fuel-tools4.install

Changes not staged for commit:
  (use "git add <file>..." to update what will be committed)
  (use "git checkout -- <file>..." to discard changes in working directory)

	modified:   bionic/debian/changelog
	modified:   bionic/debian/libignition-fuel-tools4-dev.install
	modified:   bionic/debian/libignition-fuel-tools4.install
	modified:   debian/sid/debian/changelog
	modified:   debian/sid/debian/libignition-fuel-tools4-dev.install
	modified:   debian/sid/debian/libignition-fuel-tools4.install
	modified:   debian/stretch/debian/changelog
	modified:   ubuntu/debian/control
```

Nothing is committed.
description.html:
Some black magic to automatically bump a -release repository to a new major version. Some operations and checks are automatically done. The output could show some FIXME warnings that need manual attention.

I tested it on the copy of ign-fuel-tools3:

https://github.com/ignition-release/ign-fuel-tools4-release

Run with:

‌

jrivero@nium ign-fuel-tools4-release $ ~/release-repo-scripts/bump_major_version.bash 3 4
Moving -release info
==============================
 - From: ignition-fuel-tools3
 - To  : ignition-fuel-tools4
=============================

 * Making unversioned file from ubuntu/debian/libignition-fuel-tools3.install
   - Move symlinks
     - move ./bionic/debian/libignition-fuel-tools3.install
     - move ./debian/sid/debian/libignition-fuel-tools3.install
 * Making unversioned file from ubuntu/debian/libignition-fuel-tools3-dev.install
   - Move symlinks
     - move ./bionic/debian/libignition-fuel-tools3-dev.install
     - move ./debian/sid/debian/libignition-fuel-tools3-dev.install

 * Renaming install files

 * Update changelogs
     ./bionic/debian/changelog
     ./debian/stretch/debian/changelog
     ./debian/sid/debian/changelog

 * Changing values in control file
 * Safety checks in control
    ! FIXME: Breaks clause detected in control file ./ubuntu/debian/control
    ! FIXME: Replaces clause detected in control file ./ubuntu/debian/control

 * Changing values in rules file

 * Safety checks in symlinks
    ! FIXME: Found broken link ./debian/stretch/debian/libignition-fuel-tools2.install
    ! FIXME: Found broken link ./debian/stretch/debian/libignition-fuel-tools2-dev.install

git status

jrivero@nium ign-fuel-tools4-release $ (master) git status
On branch master
Your branch is up to date with 'origin/master'.

Changes to be committed:
  (use "git reset HEAD <file>..." to unstage)

    renamed:    bionic/debian/libignition-fuel-tools3-dev.install -> bionic/debian/libignition-fuel-tools4-dev.install
    renamed:    bionic/debian/libignition-fuel-tools3.install -> bionic/debian/libignition-fuel-tools4.install

    renamed:    debian/sid/debian/libignition-fuel-tools3.install -> debian/sid/debian/libignition-fuel-tools4.install
    renamed:    ubuntu/debian/libignition-fuel-tools3-dev.install -> ubuntu/debian/libignition-fuel-tools4-dev.install
    renamed:    ubuntu/debian/libignition-fuel-tools3.install -> ubuntu/debian/libignition-fuel-tools4.install

Changes not staged for commit:
  (use "git add <file>..." to update what will be committed)
  (use "git checkout -- <file>..." to discard changes in working directory)

    modified:   bionic/debian/changelog
    modified:   bionic/debian/libignition-fuel-tools4-dev.install
    modified:   bionic/debian/libignition-fuel-tools4.install
    modified:   debian/sid/debian/changelog
    modified:   debian/sid/debian/libignition-fuel-tools4-dev.install
    modified:   debian/sid/debian/libignition-fuel-tools4.install
    modified:   debian/stretch/debian/changelog
    modified:   ubuntu/debian/control

Nothing is committed.

title.raw: Add script to create to bump -release repo metadata to a new major

Some black magic to automatically bump a -release repository to a new major version. Some operations and checks are automatically done. The output could show some FIXME warnings that need manual attention.

I tested it on the copy of ign-fuel-tools3:

	modified:   ubuntu/debian/control

Nothing is committed.
